item.title: CVE-2022-4896|2024-08-03T01:55:45.930Z -- control%20de%20ciber -- control%20de%20ciber
item.description: Cyber Control, in its 1.650 version, is affected by a vulnerabilityÂ in the generation on the server of pop-up windows with the messages "PNTMEDIDAS", "PEDIR", "HAYDISCOA" or "SPOOLER". A complete denial of service can be achieved by sending multiple requests simultaneously on a core.
